section.title: Updating a {t.agent}
section.para: To update the {t.agent}, follow the procedure below:

step.para: Copy the file /etc/trento/agent.yaml.rpmsave to /etc/trento/agent.yaml. Make sure that entries facts-service-url, server-url, and api-key in /etc/trento/agent.yaml are correct.

step.screen:
{prompt.user}sudo systemctl status trento-agent ● trento-agent.service - {t.agent} service Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/trento-agent.service; enabled; vendor preset: disabled) Active: active (running) since Wed 2021-11-24 17:37:46 UTC; 4s ago Main PID: 22055 (trento) Tasks: 10 CGroup: /system.slice/trento-agent.service ├─22055 /usr/bin/trento agent start --consul-config-dir=/srv/consul/consul.d └─22220 /usr/bin/ruby.ruby2.5 /usr/sbin/SUSEConnect -s
[...]

step.para: Check the version in the Hosts overview of the {t.web} (URL http://TRENTO_SERVER_HOSTNAME).
Repeat this procedure in all {t.agent} hosts.
